name: Self-Worth
negative_description: Deep sense of worthlessness feeling fundamentally flawed
positive_description: Healthy self-esteem recognizing inherent value and accepting imperfections

name: Future Outlook
negative_description: Hopelessness seeing no possibility for positive change
positive_description: Optimism ability to envision and work toward better possibilities

name: Social Impact
negative_description: Feeling like a burden believing others would be better off without you
positive_description: Recognizing contributions understanding your positive impact on others

name: Emotional Resilience
negative_description: Overwhelming pain feeling unable to cope with emotions
positive_description: Ability to navigate difficult feelings understanding emotions are temporary

name: Self-Reflection/Growth
negative_description: Excessive guilt and shame harsh self-judgment
positive_description: Self-compassion learning from experiences embracing personal development
